name: Fatima Abubakar Mala
title: Public Health Tutor

education.institution: College of Nursing and Midwifery, Maiduguri
education.degree: Higher National Diploma in Public Health Nursing

bio: Fatima Abubakar Mala is a dedicated Public Health tutor passionate about preventive medicine, maternal and child health, and promoting hygiene education in underserved communities. She believes that strong community awareness is the foundation of a healthier Nigeria.

testimonials.name: Hauwa Ali
testimonials.comment: Madam Fatima’s teaching style is warm and interactive — she makes every learner feel confident.

testimonials.name: Yusuf Ibrahim
testimonials.comment: Her examples are practical and relatable; she connects classroom knowledge to real field experiences.
